metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11166 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The ReadXWDImage function in coders\xwd.c in ImageMagick 7.0.5-6 has a memory leak vulnerability that can cause memory exhaustion via a crafted length (number of color-map entries) field in the header of an XWD file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fix by 0034-2-2-CVE-2017-8352.patch as of 2018-06-06, doesn't appear fixed in jessie not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
